    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/v3

    ValueWithAttributes MeetingCenter

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/v3:MeetingCenter

      • Description

        Meeting center details for a facility.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<MeetingCenter largestRoomSpace="2000 sq ft" largestSeatingCapacity="200" meetingRoomCode="2" meetingRoomCount="15" unitOfMeasureCode="2" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/organization/v3"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "MeetingCenter" : {
    "value" : null,
    "meetingRoomCount" : 15,
    "largestSeatingCapacity" : 200,
    "largestRoomSpace" : "2000 sq ft",
    "unitOfMeasureCode" : "2",
    "meetingRoomCode" : "2"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        meetingRoomCount
        The total number of unique meeting rooms provided at the hotel facility. For example, if the hotel has a grand ballroom that breaks into Salon A, B, and C -the total number of unique meeting rooms is three.
        Details
        Type NonNegativeInteger
        Example Value 15
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        largestSeatingCapacity
        The largest seating capacity available in the largest meeting room - generally this is for theatre-style room setup.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 200
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        largestRoomSpace
        The amount of room space for the largest unique meeting room at the facility.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:string
        Example Value 2000 sq ft
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        unitOfMeasureCode
        The unit of measure in a code format (e.g., inches, pixels, centimeters). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure Code (UOM).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
        meetingRoomCode
        Used as a qualifier when searching for properties. Refer to OpenTravel Code list Meeting Room Code (MRC).
        Details
        Type OTA_Code
        Example Value 2
        Required false
        Pattern [0-9A-Z]{1,4}(\.[A-Z]{3}(\.X){0,1}){0,1}
        Max Occurrences 1
